pages.title: The Vault Gods
pages.text: The $(#033dfc)Vault Gods$() are a group of powerful entities that can majorly $(#033dfc)affect$() your path of $(#033dfc)Vault Hunting$().

pages.title: God Altars
pages.text: $(#033dfc)God Altars$() are Altars that can be found inside Vaults on Vault Bedrock $(#033dfc)Monuments$(). Each God has an associated Altar indicated by the colored particles with varying tasks associated to them, which upon completing the Altar rewards the player with an $(#033dfc)Altar Chest$().

pages.title: Favours
pages.text: Each Vault God has a certain $(#033dfc)Favour Level$() associated with you up to $(#033dfc)-16$() or $(#033dfc)+16$() Levels.$(br)To obtain a favour with a certain Vault God, it is necessary to $(#033dfc)complete a God Altar$() of the Gods type, which has a base chance of increasing your $(#033dfc)Favour$() by $(#033dfc)5%$(), however increasing one Gods favour will decrease it for another.

pages.title: Favour Effects
pages.text: Upon reaching $(#033dfc)Level 50$() and having a favour crossing either $(#033dfc)+4$() or $(#033dfc)-4$(), there is a $(#033dfc)75%$() chance that a God will modify the Vault in either a $(#f00)negative$() or $(#04ff00)positive$() way, depending on the $(#033dfc)Favour Level$(). Impacts of the effects scale with the $(#033dfc)Favour amount$().

pages.title: Favour Chances
pages.text: You can increase the chance at receiving a $(#033dfc)Favour$() upon completing a God Altar by having an $(#033dfc)Idol$() of the respective Vault God equipped, granting $(#033dfc)+5%$() to receive a Favour. This can be further enhanced by $(#033dfc)Hallowing$() the Idol, adding another $(#033dfc)+5%$() for a total of $(#033dfc)15%$().
